data.message: Hi! I run a supportgroup for women whi have or has experienced violence and is trying to recover, leave, file lawsuits or needs help and support rapporting to the police. Since i want women to be able to find the group I can't make it secret. But members in the group and potential members that is too afraid to join is afraid because all though the content of the page is hidden, the members is listed for everyone to see. Is there a way to solve this?
